  • Method Details

    • name

      BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder name(String name)
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the broadcast round. Length must be between 3 and 80 characters.
      Example: Round 1

    • syncUrl

      BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder syncUrl(URI syncUrl)
      Parameters:
      syncUrl - URL that Lichess will poll to get updates about the games.
      It must be publicly accessible from the Internet.
      If the syncUrl is missing, then the broadcast needs to be fed by pushing PGN to it.
      Example: https://myserver.org/myevent/round-10/games.pgn

    • syncUrl

      default BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder syncUrl(String syncUrl)
      Parameters:
      syncUrl - URL that Lichess will poll to get updates about the games.
      It must be publicly accessible from the Internet.
      If the syncUrl is missing, then the broadcast needs to be fed by pushing PGN to it.
      Example: https://myserver.org/myevent/round-10/games.pgn

    • syncUrls

      BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder syncUrls(List<URI> syncUrls)
      Parameters:
      syncUrls - URLs that Lichess will poll to get updates about the games.
      They must be publicly accessible from the Internet.
      Example: https://myserver.org/myevent/round-10/games.pgn

    • syncUrls

      default BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder syncUrls(String... syncUrls)
      See syncUrls(List)

    • syncIds

      BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder syncIds(List<String> syncIds)
      Parameters:
      syncIds - Lichess game IDs - Up to 64 Lichess game IDs

    • syncIds

      default BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder syncIds(String... syncIds)
      Parameters:
      syncIds - Lichess game IDs - Up to 64 Lichess game IDs

    • syncUsers

      BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder syncUsers(List<String> syncUsers)
      Parameters:
      syncUsers - Up to 100 Lichess usernames

    • syncUsers

      default BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder syncUsers(String... syncUsers)
      Parameters:
      syncUsers - Up to 100 Lichess usernames

    • rated

      BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder rated(boolean rated)
      Whether the round is used when calculating players' rating changes. Default true

    • rated

      default BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder rated()
      Whether the round is used when calculating players' rating changes. Default true

    • delay

      BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder delay(long delay)
      Parameters:
      delay - The delay of the broadcast, in seconds

    • delay

      default BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder delay(Duration delay)
      Parameters:
      delay - The delay duration of the broadcast

    • period

      BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder period(int period)
      Only for Admins. Waiting time for each poll, in seconds. Between 2 and 60 seconds.
      Parameters:
      period - seconds wait between polls

    • period

      default BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder period(Duration period)
      Only for Admins. Waiting time for each poll. Between 2 and 60 seconds.
      Parameters:
      period - duration wait time between polls

    • startsAt

      BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder startsAt(long startsAt)
      Parameters:
      startsAt - Timestamp in milliseconds of broadcast round start.
      Leave empty to manually start the broadcast round.

    • startsAt

      default BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder startsAt(ZonedDateTime startsAt)
      Parameters:
      startsAt - Broadcast round start.
      Leave empty to manually start the broadcast round.

    • startsAt

      default BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder startsAt(Function<ZonedDateTime, ZonedDateTime> now)
      Parameters:
      now - Broadcast round start, from a given ZonedDateTime.now() instance.

    • startsAfterPrevious

      BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder startsAfterPrevious(boolean startsAfterPrevious)
      The start date is unknown, and the round will start automatically when the previous round completes.
      Parameters:
      startsAfterPrevious -

    • startsAfterPrevious

      default BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder startsAfterPrevious()
      The start date is unknown, and the round will start automatically when the previous round completes.

    • patch

      BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder patch(boolean patch)
      Only update the provided fields, leaving others unchanged. Default true

    • patch

      default BroadcastsApiAuth.RoundBuilder patch()
      Only update the provided fields, leaving others unchanged. Default true
